topics.body:
Here's all I have my KK Sider fanfic. Unfortunately, it's all SFW.

“This is ridiculous.” 

The building seemed almost larger, inflated by rumor and extra pearls of neon lights. Her mind paid no attention to the wisdom of her mouth as she pressed on, past the padded doors and into the gape of an utterly devoid dance floor. Really, if what Patty had told her was true, the mayor really should have been thinking about closing this place down. She traced her fingers across the clubroom walls, reluctant to approach the figure on-stage. The white canine must have noticed her by now, but the guitar he was polishing seemed to be his main concern. 

“K.K. Slider?” she asked softly. Her voice carried the innocent demure of a child’s. 

“That’s me, Jane.”

She reddened. “Uh, that’s not really my name. Well, that’s not my name at all, actually.”

The pooch shifted in his performer’s seat, soft vinyl flushing against his tail. “Relax, cat. It’s an expression.” He twiddled the strings. “You looking for a tune that’ll fly you to the moon?”

“Actually, I came with a request.” Was she really going to say it?

“Oh?” He laid the guitar flat on his lap and bent over it, folding his arms to assume a position that was the epitome of cool. “Lay it on me.” 

The mayor’s arms knotted into pretzel-like contortions as she struggled with the embarrassing words. “It’s…K.K. Seduction.” She tensed, and waited. Patty would jump out from behind Shrunk’s potted plant at any moment, laughing at her friend’s naivety.

Instead, K.K. smiled. “Seduction, huh? You’re no square. You must have been…around.”

“I guess you can say that.”
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442
